Author: brett
Title: Time Flies When You're Unprepared - Ben Stein

Author: brett
Content:
Is this list of on-line resources stunning?

No, not really. But it's potentially helpful and that was my initial reaction in context of all the other stuff he's put out recently.

Author: staunch
Content: A camera from every player's POV seems way more interesting to me.\n

Author: davidw
Content: I know a guy who works there, and indeed, he likes it quite a lot, even though he's not wild about the Perl code.

Title: Forget about Techcrunch -- Mashable is The King of Startup Reviews
